definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: Kaifu is a relative moderate in the Japanese political lexicon .
sentences.chinese: 海部在日本政治词汇中是一个相对的温和派。

sentences.english: Ms Royal, believe it or not, is considered a moderate.
sentences.chinese: 相信与否，罗雅尔女士被认为是温和派。

sentences.english: The moderates finally plunked for  the party candidate.
sentences.chinese: 温和派最后支持了党的候选人。

sentences.english: The Moderates, on the other hand, have left an ambiguous and, in the end, harmful legacy.
sentences.chinese: 而温和派们则始终态度含糊，最终，遗患无穷。

sentences.english: Now, with DOVE, the security graphic artist has the same opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 现在，与温和派人物，安全书画艺术家有相同的机会。

sentences.english: A moderate Democrat, Giffords’ Arizona office was vandalized last year.
sentences.chinese: 温和派民主党人吉福兹的办公室去年遭到破坏骚扰。

sentences.english: How did I come to be with the "softs" at the congress ?
sentences.chinese: 在代表大会上，我怎么会站在“温和派”一边呢？

sentences.english: Hua and his moderate allies quickly arrested the Gang of Four.
sentences.chinese: 华国锋及其温和派人士迅速逮捕了四人帮。

sentences.english: This has the potential to open doors for moderates within the FDLR to lay down their weapons.
sentences.chinese: 这有可能打开大门内的民主力量的温和派放下武器。

sentences.english: They, in turn, were ruthless in killing and marginalising more moderate Tamils.
sentences.chinese: 他们无情的杀戮转而使更多的温和派泰米尔人边缘化。

sentences.english: The initiative’s goal is to create a global movement of moderates, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他说，这项倡议的目标是发起一场全球温和派运动。
